index.registerPeriodClosed: The time period to register to have your say has closed.
index.heading1: Register to have your say about a national infrastructure project
index.heading2: You are registering to have your say about the
index.paragraph1: Use this service to have your say about a national infrastructure project. We need your personal details and your comments about the
index.paragraph2: You must include comments with your registration. Your comments must be about what you consider to be the main issues and impacts. You can also include anything that may affect your day-to-day life.
index.paragraph4: You will be able to submit further comments during the examination of the application once you have registered.
index.paragraph5: You must submit your registration before
index.heading5: If you are registering yourself as an individual
index.heading6: If you are registering for and organisation you work or volunteer for
index.listItem8: the name of the charity or organisation you work for
index.heading7: If you are registering on behalf of another person or organisation
index.listItem15: the details of the person, family group or organisation you are representing
index.listItem16: their registration comments about the project
